snippet: Stocks rebounded and closed at record highs on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve’s policy-making committee chose to keep the central bank’s economic stimulus program unchanged.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rebounded and closed at record highs on Wednesday after the Federal Reserve’s policy-making committee chose to keep the central bank’s economic stimulus program unchanged.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes at Record Highs After Fed Leaves Stimulus Intact
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Closes at Record Highs After Fed Leaves Stimulus Intact
